definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: Song structure in which the same music is repeated with every stanza (strophe) of the poem.
sentences.chinese: 分節歌曲形式是指各節歌詞唱同一旋律的歌曲結構。

sentences.english: The development of articulate speech is the main result of this period.
sentences.chinese: 分節語的產生是這一時期的主要成就。

sentences.english: Einally, the developing trend and status quo of critical technologies are described.
sentences.chinese: 然後分節敘述了各個重點工藝技術的發展趨勢與現狀。

definition: Horse-Face, one of the two guardians of the underworld in Chinese mythology
to fan/to flap/to incite/to instigate (a strike etc)
(of an argument, theory etc) full of flaws (idiom)
